column.name: DWH_SOURCE_IND
column.comment: Indicator from which system the data record comes (2: Debit, 3: Credit).

column.name: MARKET_CODE
column.comment: Market to which the customer is assigned. Examples are MMC (credit customers who have a contract with VfD2), PUC (credit customers who have a contract with a partner company), MMO (prepaid customers who are directly assigned to VfD2), PUA (prepdaid customers

column.name: DISCOUNT_PLAN_CD
column.comment: Indicates the price plan discount code.

column.name: EFFECTIVE_DATE
column.comment: The effective Date of the Email Validation - The Access Information is effective dated.

column.name: SYS_CREATION_DATE
column.comment: Date of creation of the data record in the operative system

column.name: SYS_UPDATE_DATE
column.comment: Date of modification of the data record in the operative system

column.name: OPERATOR_ID
column.comment: Unique ID of the last user

column.name: APPLICATION_ID
column.comment: Unique ID of the application that last processed the sentence

column.name: EXP_DATE
column.comment: Expiry Date

column.name: DISC_DEPEND_CD
column.comment: Determines the discount method. F  - Flat T  - Tier L  - Linear U  - Formula

column.name: EU_FLAT_AMT
column.comment: If the discount plan is defined as flat, this field contains the flat amount in EURO.

column.name: DISC_QTY_TYPE
column.comment: Determines if the discount amounts are defined by currency or by percentage. D  - Monetary P   - Percentage

column.name: DISC_DESC_SEQ
column.comment: This field points to entries in the BILL_DESC entity containing a description of the respective item in different languages.

column.name: DISCOUNT_DESC
column.comment: description

column.name: ADJ_REASON_CODE
column.comment: Abbreviation of the adjustment reason.

column.name: DISC_STATUS
column.comment: The discount item status. A  -  Active I   -  In work

column.name: CALC_METHOD
column.comment: This field determines the discount criterion. Valid Values: · CHARGE - Total  Charges · DURAT - Duration of calls (in minutes) · NUMCTN - Number of Subscribers · SUBSLO - Subscriber's longevity. · NEWSUB - Number of newly activated subscribers (only valid

column.name: PRODUCT_TYPE
column.comment: Identifies the participant's product type (e.g. GSM).

column.name: COMMIS_PER_SUB_IND
column.comment: When 'Commission per Subscriber Ind' = Yes, then it is possible to define a flat value, or a commission tiered by the number of subscribers. This value will later be multiplied by the number of subscribers in order to calculate the Commission.

column.name: DISC_LEVEL_CODE
column.comment: This attribute indicates whether the Discount Item is at a subscriber or BAN level.  C - subscriber level B - BAN level

column.name: OFF_CYCLE_DISC_IND
column.comment: The system supports BAN level off-cycle discounts (quarterly, bi-annual and annual discounts). The discount may be greater than the amount due. The off-cycle discounts can be defined for Total UC, Total RC and Total UC + RC.

column.name: OFF_CYCLE_PERIOD
column.comment: It is possible to give off-cycle discounts with different discount periods to different customer levels in the same hierarchy. For example, a quarterly discount on Total RC for a single BAN in a hierarchy and an annual discount on Total RC + UC for the en

column.name: PRORATION_IND
column.comment: This attribute defines whether the feature's recurring charge (RC) will be prorated. It is possible to define that the charge is either always prorated, never prorated, or a charge with no proration, if the service is active for a customer on a bill day.

column.name: SPECIAL_PURPOSE_DISC
column.comment: The discount plan will be identified as an 'Umsatzbonus' discount according to a new field on the DISCOUNT_PLAN table. U - Umsatzbonus

column.name: COMM_DISC_CATEGORY
column.comment: Commission Discount Category; describes the commission category.

column.name: SPEC_PUR_FTR_CD
column.comment: Contains a feature code -  when SPECIAL_PURPOSE = B. Will contain NULL when SPECIAL_PURPOSE = NULL.

column.name: FILLER
column.comment: N/A
